data.text:
Welcome to Shiloh

The Shiloh Christian Community Church remains a beacon on the hill, dedicated to preserving the family and serving Baltimore. We are a body of believers who provide refuge and comfort for people by demonstrating the Love of Jesus Christ.

Meet Our Pastor

Rev. Jimmy C. Baldwin Sr., M.Div. was elected to serve and installed as the pastor of Shiloh Christian Community Church in 1985.
